plugin.name: 🔁 @repeat Extensions
plugin.description: Commands to extend the built-in @repeat() mechanism. See info for more details.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark
plugin.lastUpdateInfo: Now works in Weekly notes as well.

plugin.commands.name: generate repeats
plugin.commands.description: Generate new @repeat() tasks from completed ones

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description: Set how much output will be displayed for this plugin in the NotePlan > Help > Plugin Console. DEBUG is the most verbose; NONE is the least (silent).
